45.eng-name: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ali, may Allah be please with him that the Prophet said:"The lives of the believers are equal in value, and they are one against others, and they hasten to support the asylum granted by the least of them. But no believer may be killed in return for a disbeliever, nor one with a covenant while his covenant is in effect

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقَوَدِ بَيْنَ الأَحْرَارِ وَالْمَمَالِيكِ فِي النَّفْسِ
chapter.eng-name: Cases Of Retaliation Between Free Men And Slaves
